talk.abstract: Managing scientific data in the Bioinformatics domain is a complex process and this talk will introduce you to MongoDB used to enable datamining and processing of very large Gene datasets obtained from various sources.
talk.description: Managing scientific data in the Bioinformatics domain is a complex process and this talk will introduce you to MongoDB used to enable datamining and processing of very large Gene datasets obtained from various sources.
talk.name: MongoDB and Gene databases
talk.title: MongoDB and Gene databases
